forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 17C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 62F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low around 10C. WSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds WSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Showers early with mainly sunny skies in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Rain showers in the morning will give way to sunshine in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 47F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
